record.title: CONDITIONAL ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, JULY 2, 2007

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today on a motion offered pursuant to this order, it adjourn to meet at 2 p.m. on Monday, July 2, 2007, unless it sooner has received a message from the Senate transmitting its concurrence in House Concurrent Resolution 179, in which case the House shall stand adjourned pursuant to that concurrent resolution.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New Jersey?
